panels.description: Average block commit rate per shard (not summed across all validators)
panels.title: Avg Blocks/sec

panels.description: Network-wide unique transactions finalized per second. Cross-shard txns are counted once (divided by number of shards involved).
panels.title: Unique TPS

panels.description: Average view changes per minute across all validators
panels.title: View Changes/min

panels.description: Total cross-shard transactions currently in flight across the network
panels.title: Cross-Shard Pending

panels.description: Block height by shard (max across validators in each shard)
panels.title: Block Height by Shard

panels.description: Block commit latency percentiles (aggregated across all validators)
panels.title: Block Commit Latency

panels.description: Average block commit rate per shard (one line per shard)
panels.title: Block Rate by Shard

panels.description: View changes per validator - indicates consensus disruptions
panels.title: View Changes by Validator

panels.description: Unique transactions finalized per second. Single-shard txns counted once per shard, cross-shard divided by 2 to avoid double-counting.
panels.title: Unique Transaction Throughput

panels.description: Per-shard transaction throughput (avg across validators in each shard)
panels.title: Transaction Rate by Shard

panels.description: Average mempool size per shard
panels.title: Mempool Size by Shard

panels.description: Total transaction rejections across the cluster by reason
panels.title: Transaction Rejections

panels.description: Average connected peers per validator in each shard
panels.title: Connected Peers by Shard

panels.description: Total cluster network bandwidth (sum of all validators)
panels.title: Cluster Network Bandwidth

panels.description: Average message rate per validator (not summed)
panels.title: Avg Message Rate per Validator

panels.description: Average storage write rate per validator (blocks are written by all validators in a shard)
panels.title: Avg Storage Write Rate per Validator

panels.description: Max blocks behind in each shard (0 = fully synced)
panels.title: Max Blocks Behind by Shard

panels.description: Total fetch operations completed across the cluster
panels.title: Fetch Completed Rate

panels.description: Total fetch requests in flight across all validators
panels.title: Fetch In Flight

panels.description: Livelock detection metrics (summed across shards, divided to avoid double-counting)
panels.title: Livelock Detection

panels.description: Average lock contention ratio across all validators
panels.title: Lock Contention

panels.description: Error rates averaged across validators (not summed)
panels.title: Error Rates

panels.description: Average thread pool queue depth per validator
panels.title: Avg Thread Pool Queue Depth

panels.description: Speculative execution cache hit rate - higher is better (more latency hidden)
panels.title: Speculative Hit Rate

panels.description: Rate of speculative execution cache hits and misses
panels.title: Speculative Execution Rate

panels.description: Speculative execution latency vs normal execution latency
panels.title: Speculative vs Normal Execution Latency

panels.description: Critical event channel depths - high values indicate backpressure
panels.title: Core Event Channel Depths

panels.description: Transaction and network request channel depths
panels.title: Transaction & Network Channel Depths
